4630/A0/04/001/003.status_value: The analysis undertaken jointly with the Research Center under Supreme Court  led to a number of recommendations both in terms of changes into legislation and judicial practices concerning the ensuring child rights in the justice system. This was discussed with key stakeholder partners for establishment of working group to develop concrete recommendations into legislative framework concerning children in conflict and in contact with the laws.

4630/A0/04/001/003.status_value: UNICEF has conducted a cost-benefit analysis based on financial data of selected child care institutions of Uzbekistan and the only available model of alternative/preventive services in the country (¿SOS villages¿ programme component of family support services). As the DI study showed the finances required for prevention of separation are considerably lower when compared to the cost of institutionalizing children without parental care. This research report has been shared with the Government for
